product_description: Sleek metal trim and signature T-shaped insets at the temples highlight the round silhouette of these Italian-crafted sunglasses.
product_details_and_care:
Sleek metal trim and signature T-shaped insets at the temples highlight the round silhouette of these Italian-crafted sunglasses.
54mm lens width; 20mm bridge width; 140mm temple length
100% UV protection
CR-39 lenses
Adjustable nose pads
Metal
Made in Italy
